Module cerei
Package au.org.nifpi.cerei

Class NetworkParameter

java.lang.Object
au.org.nifpi.cerei.NetworkParameter
public class NetworkParameter extends Object
Loads the various tariffs, per monthly and per meter per monthly from the "Network Tariff" input file TO DO - Validation of all fields in the input file.
Author:
James Sargeant

  • Constructor Details

    • NetworkParameter

      public NetworkParameter(InputFile tariffFile) throws Exception
      Open up the General Parameter file (aka Tariff) ready for reading. Line by line reading handled by method loadTariff
      Parameters:
      tariffFile - InputFile containing name of file to read
      Throws:
      Exception - If there is a problem opening or reading the file.

  • Method Details

    • loadMeterParameters

      public String loadMeterParameters(String meterName, BufferedReader reader) throws Exception
      Grab the next 13 lines (one header and one line per month) as they contain the per meter per month parameters
      Parameters:
      meterName - the name of the meter affected.
      reader - Access to the General Parameter file
      Returns:
      String containing any validation error messages.
      Throws:
      Exception - from called methods - most likely insufficient number of parameters in one of the rows

    • findDayFromString

      public int findDayFromString(String dayString)
      Convert a day string in the general parameter file to an index into the rate array
      Parameters:
      dayString - Three letter day string - mon, tue, wed, thu, fri, sat or sun.
      Returns:
      integer representing day of week, 0=mon, 1=tue, ... 6=sun.

    • isSpecifiedDistributionList

      public boolean isSpecifiedDistributionList()
      Does the "Network Tariff" parameter .csv file contain a specific list of meters to distribute generated energy across?
      Returns:
      Whether or not a specific list of meters to distribute generated energy across exists.
